verses.verse: It happened after many<WH7227> days,<WH3117> that the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to Elijah,<WH452> in the third<WH7992> year,<WH8141> saying,<WH559> "Go,<WH3212> show<WH7200> yourself to Ahab;<WH256> and I will send<WH5414> rain<WH4306> on<WH6440> the earth.<WH127>"
Elijah<WH452> went<WH3212> to show<WH7200> himself to Ahab.<WH256> The famine<WH7458> was severe<WH2389> in Samaria.<WH8111>
Ahab<WH256> called<WH7121> Obadiah,<WH5662> who was over the household.<WH1004> (Now Obadiah<WH5662> feared<WH3373> Yahweh<WH3068> greatly:<WH3966>

for it was so,<WH348> when Jezebel cut off<WH3772> the prophets<WH5030> of Yahweh,<WH3068> that Obadiah<WH5662> took<WH3947> one hundred<WH3967> prophets,<WH5030> and hid<WH2244> them by fifty<WH376> in a cave,<WH4631> and fed<WH3557> them with bread<WH3899> and water.<WH4325>)

Ahab<WH256> said<WH559> to Obadiah,<WH5662> "Go<WH3212> through the land,<WH776> to all the springs<WH4599> of water,<WH4325> and to all the brooks.<WH5158> Perhaps<WH194> we may find<WH4672> grass<WH2682> and save<WH2421> the horses<WH5483> and mules<WH6505> alive,<WH2421> that we not lose<WH3772> all the animals.<WH929>"

So they divided<WH2505> the land<WH776> between them to pass throughout<WH5674> it:<WH256> Ahab went<WH1980> one<WH259> way<WH1870> by himself,<WH5662> and Obadiah went<WH1980> another<WH259> way by himself.<WH1870>

As Obadiah<WH5662> was in the way,<WH1870> behold,<WH452> Elijah met<WH7125> him:<WH5234> and he recognized him,<WH5307> and fell on his face,<WH6440> and said,<WH559> "Is it you,<WH113> my lord Elijah?<WH452>"
He answered<WH559> him,<WH3212> "It is I. Go, tell<WH559> your lord,<WH113> <WH452> 'Behold, Elijah is here!'"
He said,<WH559> "Wherein have I sinned,<WH2398> that you would deliver<WH5414> your servant<WH5650> into the hand<WH3027> of Ahab,<WH256> to kill me?<WH4191>

As Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> lives,<WH2416> there is no<WH3426> nation<WH1471> or kingdom,<WH4467> where<WH834> my lord<WH113> has not sent<WH7971> to seek<WH1245> you.<WH559> When they said, <WH7650> 'He is not here,' he took an oath of the kingdom<WH4467> and nation,<WH1471> that they didn't<WH4672> find you.
Now you say,<WH559> <WH3212> 'Go, tell<WH559> your lord,<WH113> "Behold,<WH452> Elijah is here."'

It will happen,<WH3212> as soon as I am gone from you,<WH7307> that the Spirit of Yahweh<WH3068> will carry<WH5375> you I don't<WH3045> know where;<WH935> and so when I come and tell<WH5046> Ahab,<WH256> and he can't<WH4672> find you,<WH2026> he will kill me.<WH5650> But I, your servant, have feared<WH3372> Yahweh<WH3068> from my youth.<WH5271>

Wasn't<WH5046> it told my lord<WH113> what I did<WH6213> when Jezebel<WH348> killed<WH2026> the prophets<WH5030> of Yahweh,<WH3068> how I hid<WH2244> one hundred<WH3967> men<WH376> of Yahweh<WH3068>'s prophets<WH5030> with fifty<WH2572> to a cave,<WH4631> and fed<WH3557> them with bread<WH3899> and water?<WH4325>
Now you say,<WH559> <WH3212> 'Go, tell<WH559> your lord,<WH113> "Behold,<WH452> Elijah is here;<WH2026>"' and he will kill me."
Elijah<WH452> said,<WH559> "As Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> lives,<WH2416> before<WH6440> whom I stand,<WH5975> I will surely show<WH7200> myself to him today.<WH3117>"
So Obadiah<WH5662> went<WH3212> to meet<WH7125> Ahab,<WH256> and told<WH5046> him;<WH256> and Ahab went<WH3212> to meet<WH7125> Elijah.<WH452>
It happened,<WH256> when Ahab saw<WH7200> Elijah,<WH452> that Ahab<WH256> said<WH559> to him,<WH5916> "Is that you, you troubler of Israel?<WH3478>"

He answered,<WH559> "I have not troubled<WH5916> Israel;<WH3478> but you,<WH1> and your father's house,<WH1004> in that you have forsaken<WH5800> the commandments<WH4687> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and you have followed<WH3212> the Baals.<WH1168>

Now therefore send,<WH7971> and gather<WH6908> to me all Israel<WH3478> to Mount<WH2022> Carmel,<WH3760> and four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> of the prophets<WH5030> of Baal,<WH1168> and four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> of the prophets<WH5030> of the Asherah,<WH842> who eat<WH398> at Jezebel<WH348>'s table.<WH7979>"
So Ahab<WH256> sent<WH7971> to all the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and gathered<WH6908> the prophets<WH5030> together<WH6908> to Mount<WH2022> Carmel.<WH3760>

Elijah<WH452> came<WH5066> near to all the people,<WH5971> and said,<WH559> "How long<WH5921> will you waver<WH6452> between the two<WH8147> sides?<WH3068> If Yahweh is God,<WH430> follow<WH3212> him;<WH1168> but if Baal, then follow<WH3212> him.<WH5971>" The people answered<WH6030> him not a word.<WH1697>

Then Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> to the people,<WH5971> "I,<WH3498> even I only, am left a prophet<WH5030> of Yahweh;<WH3068> but Baal<WH1168>'s prophets<WH5030> are four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> fifty<WH2572> men.<WH376>

Let them therefore give<WH5414> us two<WH8147> bulls;<WH6499> and let them choose<WH977> one<WH259> bull<WH6499> for themselves,<WH5408> and cut it in pieces, and lay<WH7760> it on the wood,<WH6086> and put<WH7760> no fire<WH784> under;<WH6213> and I will dress the other<WH259> bull,<WH6499> and lay<WH5414> it on the wood,<WH6086> and put<WH7760> no fire under it.<WH784>

You call<WH7121> on the name<WH8034> of your god,<WH430> and I will call<WH7121> on the name<WH8034> of Yahweh.<WH3068> The God<WH430> who answers<WH6030> by fire,<WH784> let him be God.<WH430>" All the people<WH5971> answered,<WH6030> "It<WH559> is well<WH2896> said.<WH6030>"

Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> to the prophets<WH5030> of Baal,<WH1168> "Choose<WH977> one<WH259> bull<WH6499> for yourselves,<WH6213> and dress it first;<WH7223> for you are many;<WH7227> and call<WH7121> on the name<WH8034> of your god,<WH430> but put<WH7760> no fire under it.<WH784>"

They took<WH3947> the bull<WH6499> which was given<WH5414> them,<WH6213> and they dressed it,<WH7121> and called on the name<WH8034> of Baal<WH1168> from morning<WH1242> even until noon,<WH6672> saying,<WH559> Baal,<WH1168> hear<WH6030> us.<WH369> But there was no voice,<WH6963> nor any who answered.<WH6030> They leaped<WH6452> about the altar<WH4196> which was made.<WH6213>

It happened at noon,<WH6672> that Elijah<WH452> mocked<WH2048> them,<WH559> and said, "Cry<WH7121> aloud;<WH1419> for he is a god.<WH430> Either he is musing,<WH7879> or he has gone aside,<WH7873> or he is on a journey,<WH1870> or perhaps<WH194> he sleeps<WH3463> and must be awakened.<WH3364>"
They cried<WH7121> aloud,<WH6963> and cut<WH1413> themselves in their way<WH4941> with knives<WH2719> and lances,<WH7420> until the blood<WH1818> gushed out on them.<WH8210>

It was so,<WH6672> when midday was past,<WH5674> that they prophesied<WH5012> until the time of the offering<WH5927> of the offering;<WH5927> but there was neither voice,<WH6963> nor any to answer,<WH6030> nor any who regarded.<WH7182>

Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> to all the people,<WH5971> "Come near<WH5066> to me;<WH5971>" and all the people came near<WH5066> to him.<WH7495> He repaired the altar<WH4196> of Yahweh<WH3068> that was thrown down.<WH2040>

Elijah<WH452> took<WH3947> twelve<WH8147> stones,<WH68> according to the number<WH4557> of the tribes<WH7626> of the sons<WH1121> of Jacob,<WH3290> to whom the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came,<WH559> saying, "Israel<WH3478> shall be your name.<WH8034>"

With the stones<WH68> he built<WH1129> an altar<WH4196> in the name<WH8034> of Yahweh.<WH3068> He made<WH6213> a trench<WH8585> around<WH5439> the altar,<WH4196> large enough to contain<WH1004> two measures<WH5429> of seed.<WH2233>

He put<WH6186> the wood<WH6086> in order,<WH6186> and cut<WH5408> the bull<WH6499> in pieces,<WH7760> and laid it on the wood.<WH6086> He said,<WH559> "Fill<WH4390> four<WH702> jars<WH3537> with water,<WH4325> and pour<WH3332> it on the burnt offering,<WH5930> and on the wood.<WH6086>"
He said,<WH559> "Do it a second time;<WH8138>" and they did it the second time.<WH8138> He said,<WH559> "Do it a third time;<WH8138>" and they did it the third time.<WH8027>
The water<WH4325> ran<WH3212> around<WH5439> the altar;<WH4196> and he also filled<WH4390> the trench<WH8585> with water.<WH4325>

It happened at the time of the offering<WH5927> of the offering,<WH4503> that Elijah<WH452> the prophet<WH5030> came near,<WH5066> and said,<WH559> "Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Abraham,<WH85> of Isaac,<WH3327> and of Israel,<WH3478> let it be known<WH3045> this day<WH3117> that you are God<WH430> in Israel,<WH3478> and that I am your servant,<WH5650> and that I have done<WH6213> all these things at your word.<WH1697>

Hear<WH6030> me,<WH3068> Yahweh, hear<WH6030> me,<WH5971> that this people may know<WH3045> that you,<WH3068> Yahweh, are God,<WH430> and that you have turned<WH5437> their heart<WH3820> back<WH5437> again.<WH322>"

Then the fire<WH784> of Yahweh<WH3068> fell,<WH5307> and consumed<WH398> the burnt offering,<WH5930> and the wood,<WH6086> and the stones,<WH68> and the dust,<WH6083> and licked up<WH3897> the water<WH4325> that was in the trench.<WH8585>
When all the people<WH5971> saw<WH7200> it,<WH5307> they fell on their faces.<WH6440> They said,<WH559> "Yahweh,<WH3068> he is God!<WH430> Yahweh,<WH3068> he is God!<WH430>"

Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> to them,<WH8610> "Seize the prophets<WH5030> of Baal!<WH1168> Don't<WH376> let one of them escape!<WH4422>" They seized<WH8610> them.<WH452> Elijah brought them down<WH3381> to the brook<WH5158> Kishon,<WH7028> and killed them there.<WH7819>
Elijah<WH452> said<WH559> to Ahab,<WH256> "Get up,<WH5927> eat<WH398> and drink;<WH8354> for there is the sound<WH6963> of abundance<WH1995> of rain.<WH1653>"

So Ahab<WH256> went up<WH5927> to eat<WH398> and to drink.<WH8354> Elijah<WH452> went up<WH5927> to the top<WH7218> of Carmel;<WH3760> and he bowed himself down<WH1457> on the earth,<WH776> and put<WH7760> his face<WH6440> between his knees.<WH1290>

He said<WH559> to his servant,<WH5288> "Go up<WH5927> now,<WH5027> look toward<WH1870> the sea.<WH3220>" He went up,<WH5927> and looked,<WH5027> and said,<WH559> "There is nothing.<WH3972>" He said,<WH559> "Go again<WH7725>" seven<WH7651> times.<WH6471>

It happened at the seventh time,<WH7637> that he said,<WH559> "Behold,<WH6996> a small cloud,<WH5645> like a man<WH376>'s hand,<WH3709> is rising<WH5927> out of the sea.<WH3220>" He said,<WH559> "Go up,<WH5927> tell<WH559> Ahab,<WH256> <WH631> 'Get ready and go down,<WH3381> so that the rain<WH1653> doesn't<WH6113> stop you.'"

It happened in a little while,<WH3541> that the sky<WH8064> grew black<WH6937> with clouds<WH5645> and wind,<WH7307> and there was a great<WH1419> rain.<WH1653> Ahab<WH256> rode,<WH7392> and went<WH3212> to Jezreel.<WH3157>
The hand<WH3027> of Yahweh<WH3068> was on Elijah;<WH452> and he tucked<WH8151> his cloak into his belt<WH4975> and ran<WH7323> before<WH6440> Ahab<WH256> to the entrance<WH935> of Jezreel.<WH3157>
